attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the forcing through of the promotion of Gordon Brown to the post of Prime Minister, a post he was not elected to serve in, a general election should be called.

The electorate voted for "New" Labour on the popularity of Tony Blair, not Gordon Brown and so should get to choose his successor, not the lack of a suitable Labour MP.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
